txt.en: Aid Remmenylf with Wards of the Gauredain

'The men from the north, who dress like wolves, are not like the Rangers from the east. They worship the land, but then use it to create evil and darkness. They are a foul breed of Man, one I do not trust.\n\n'They have begun coming further south, even to the edges of this grove. This causes me great worry.'
'With those things done, it is now time to draw the line.'
'Men dressed as wolves defiling the forest...'
The Guaredain have slowly begun encroaching further and further south, and now threaten even the Eavespires.
The Gauradan-encampment is north of the Eavespires.
Aid Erchiel with Hunting the Hunters
Erchiel is at the Eavespires.\n\nErchiel will want to know the first tasks are complete.
